channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Responsive Contact Form Builder & Lead Generation Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Responsive Contact Form Builder & Lead Generation Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-3637|2024-05-03T06:00:02.151Z -- Unknown -- Responsive Contact Form Builder & Lead Generation Plugin
item.description: The Responsive Contact Form Builder & Lead Generation Plugin WordPress plugin through 1.8.9 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
